**Tender Announcement**

**Title (English/French)**: ServiceNow Professional Services / Services professionnels ServiceNow

**Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-5597-26080034 / cb-5597-26080034

**Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 20230161 / 20230161

**Publication Date (English/French)**: May 16, 2023 / 16 mai 2023

**Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: June 13, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT / 13 juin 2023, 14h00 HE

**Expected Contract Start and End Dates (English/French)**: July 10, 2023 – July 9, 2024 / 10 juillet 2023 – 9 juillet 2024

**Procurement Category**: SRV

**Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Description (English/French)**: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites bidders to propose for the provision of IT professional services in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Toronto over the next one to four years.

**Service Details (English/French)**: ServiceNow professional services will be provided to support the implementation, configuration, and maintenance of ServiceNow software solution.

**Technical Criteria (English/French)**: Bidders must have a minimum of three (3) years of experience in providing ServiceNow professional services and demonstrate proficiency in ServiceNow implementation, configuration, and maintenance.

**Evaluation Criteria (English/French)**: The Selection Committee will evaluate bids based on the following criteria: Technical Merit (40% weightage) and Price (60% weightage).

**References (English/French)**: Conduct online searches for the solicitation number at the [Canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The attachments are available on this website.

**Contact Information (English/French)**: Please submit your proposal to contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca.

**Closing Date and Time**: June 13, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT.
